main event: An area resident reported observing a tear-drop shaped, silvery white object that climbed rapidly out of sight in Sedona, Arizona on June 26, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as moving in an erratic manner,The observation lasted for approximately 1-2 minutes,The report was made by someone familiar with aircraft,The sighting also involved two witnesses,The object was confirmed as having no sound and was described as an oblong shape.
sighted object: a tear-drop shaped silvery white object
